It suits this body so perfectly,
my strength is recovering faster than ever before!
This body belonged to Jonathan Joestar one hundred years ago.
The blood that I just drank was from his grandson, Joseph!
And the one who allowed me to make it this far
The Joestar bloodline was mere dog shit on the road that is my destiny,
just something lying in my way...
But in the end, it appears that the Joestars are fated to be my tools.
No matter what Dio is about to do to my body down below,
you must never get enraged and lose your cool, Jotaro.
Do not worry about me anymore.
This happened because it had to happen.
Is this... the old man's soul?
Kakyoin solved the mystery of Dio's Stand.
I relayed his message to you.
If we had all fought Dio at once, we would have all perished instantly.
You have become able to move a bit within stopped time.
You have two or three seconds now...
No matter what Dio does now, you must not get angry.
If you fly into a rage and strike first,
you will only put yourself in a bad situation.
This trip was truly fun, was not it?
These fifty days really were fun.
Now he is just an empty she will!
The old man told me not to get angry, no matter what.
No one could stay calm after seeing that!
Episode 48 Long Journey Farewell, My Friends
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
I can still keep it up!
You should not be able to move any longer.
You probably gambled on the two seconds
before time starts to move again,
I feel so good, I could break out into song!
One hundred years ago, I attained immortality,
but I did not feel as absolutely wonderful then as I do now!
Joestar blood suits me so very well!
Getting mad has gotten me into trouble.
But this is not the end of it.
I still have plenty more rage to hurl at him!
I have stopped time for nine seconds!
But it appears that stopping time for nine seconds is my current limit.
Now to unleash all of my Stand's power!
You said something about being pissed off...
But your fury can achieve no more than that!
And now, without pause, my final attack!
The last and final time I will stop time!
Within my nine seconds of stopped time, I shall end this!
For some reason, Dio disappeared while time was stopped.
No matter what Dio has planned,
or what attack he might unleash
in the two seconds that Jotaro can move within stopped time,
all he needs to do is drive Star Platinum's fists into him in those two seconds!
The one thing that I know, Dio,
is that the next time I see your face, I am probably going to bust a vein!
Star Platinum has finally been defeated by my The World!
This proves that no one can surpass Dio!
Bow before my knowledge and might!
Now my ability to stop time has reached ten seconds!
I guess I should find Jotaro's lifeless body and drink his blood.
If there is any blood left to take!
My body's movements a-are slowing down...
N-No... I am not slowing down...
M-My b-body will not move at all!
I guess that is your limit now.
I stopped time at the nine second mark.
It will not take even a second to finish you off!
Right at the end of my nine seconds of movement...
Having someone approach from behind while you cannot move a muscle,
if I had to describe it,
is like when a guy who can hold his breath underwater for a minute
finally comes up for air at the very last second...
When suddenly, he feels someone grab him, and he is dragged
But for you, I feel no pity at all.
Time has begun to move again.
I do not feel even the slightest bit of compassion for you.
I have not even an ounce of pity for you.
However, just finishing you off by beating you to death now
would leave a bad taste in my mouth.
How many seconds will it take for your legs to recover?
The moment you have healed, I will throw Star Platinum at you.
If I were a gunslinger in a Western, I would say...
Let us see who is the fastest gun in the West.
You may have come this far, but you are still only human.
You think like a human, who has so little time to live.
About things leaving a bad taste in your mouth,
or living your life with no regrets...
That kind of reasoning is about as compelling as rat shit
in a bathroom, and it will be your demise!
I, Dio, have no such thoughts.
Within my mind is but one simple thought.
That is all I need to feel satisfaction!
How do you like being blinded by blood?!
Now if I just wait until dawn, you will turn into dust.
There is only one reason why you lost, Dio.
There is just one simple answer.
This is the Speed Wagon Foundation Car Two.
We are currently traveling north on Al-Nil Street.
Dio's body will stay alive until it is exposed to sunlight.
Make sure you do not let down your guard.
We are transporting his body via helicopter.
He is currently being treated in Car One.
By the way, I have got a question for you, Car Two...
Why did you put Dio and Joseph Joestar's bodies in the same car?
Because it is not over yet.
And I need to get it back.
I have no idea what you are talking about.
Is it possible to transfuse blood from one corpse to another?
A-Are you suggesting we put Dio's blood into Mr. Joestar's withered corpse?
Are you trying to bring Mr. Joestar back to life?
Dio sucked out his blood just minutes ago.
Dio's upper body has been annihilated,
but I want him to return what he is still got.
Do not you think we can still make it in time?
He does not have a pulse...
That means his heart has stopped,
so it is impossible to make blood circulate throughout his body!
We did a lot of impossible things on this journey.
I am tired of hearing that things are impossible or useless.
Those words mean nothing to us.
You said we have to get his heart moving, right?
Thanks to Dio, I have had practice with stopping and starting hearts.
Extract the blood from Dio's body and perform the transfusion!
His shriveled skin is already regaining color!
His flesh is softening and stretching!
He is come back to life!
Thanks to you, I live again!
I was just messing with you a little.
My wife's name is Suzie Q. I like to collect comic books!
Who is the female lead in the 1981 film, Tarzan, the Ape Man?
Who sang the parody of Beat It, named Eat It?
I guess you are the real thing,
if you know pointless crap like that.
Mr. Joestar has come back from the dead!
Now you have returned what you took from us,
So many people lent something to Dio.
Many people, for the last hundred years.
And too many of those things will never be returned.
The things we cannot get back are too numerous, and too great.
What we have lost is as vast as the planet Earth itself.
But it is all because of them...
It is because of them that we still live.
Are you really going back to France, Polnareff?
You do not have any more family there, do you?
Why do not you come to New York with me?
Mr. Joestar, even though my family is gone, France is my homeland.
I have many memories in my hometown.
No matter where I go, I will always return there.
But if you ever need me, give me a call.
Wherever in the world you are, I will come running.
It will be lonely without you.
but it was a lot of fun.
That journey was fun because all of you were there.
I believe that from the bottom of my heart.
Passengers on France International Airlines Flight 92,
bound for Paris, please head to Gate 18.
Well, see ya, you shit-stained geezer!
Do not you dare forget me!
If you do not hate me by then, you little jackass!
I could not forget a guy like you if I tried.
Why are you sitting up all of a sudden?
And I just felt it in my heart...
They are both coming home, Mama!
